predicate.note: Frames file for 'stash' based on sentences in wsj and automatic expansion via verbnet.

example.name: all args
example.text: A food caterer stashed stones in the false bottom of a milk pail.
example.arg: the false bottom of a milk pail

roleset.name: hide without location

example.name: hoard
example.text: The 40-year old Mr. Pope hasn't changed jobs enough -- at least the right ones -- *trace* to stash away that kind of money.

roleset.note: The adverb/particle eliminates (to my ear) the possibility for a location argument.
